Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at Jeffrey/67th
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffrey and 67th due to police activity near Jeffrey/67th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffrey, then resume their normal route on 67th due to police activity near Jeffrey/67th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and #15 Jeffrey Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffrey/67th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How doe this affect my trip?
